2. Direct Observation

Structured observations are conducted in relevant environments to gather real-time data using the ABC Model (Antecedent-Behaviour-Consequence):

  • Antecedent: What happened immediately before the behaviour?
  • Behaviour: What did the person specifically do?
  • Consequence: What happened immediately after the behaviour?

Clinical Lead

Syed Bokhari

Registered NDIS Behaviour Support Practitioner

Specialising in data-driven Functional Behaviour Assessments (FBA) and evidence-based strategies that reduce restrictive practices while enhancing the quality of life for NDIS participants.
